body_html: I am putting together a skeletal framework for calling Metal from TF. I would hold off until that is upstreamed. Once that is done, there will room for lot of contributions in building the repertoire of TF operations that can be run using Metal. @s1ddok and @cancan101 , does it sound like a plan?

body: I am putting together a skeletal framework for calling Metal from TF. I would hold off until that is upstreamed. Once that is done, there will room for lot of contributions in building the repertoire of TF operations that can be run using Metal. @s1ddok and @cancan101 , does it sound like a plan?
